Text: The Ancient Order of Hibernians (AOH) is an Irish Catholic fraternal organisation.

<Ancient Order of Hibernians
3:
--------------------
Text: Ancient Order of Hibernians:  Its name was adopted by groups of Irish immigrants in the United States, its purpose to act as guards to protect Catholic churches from anti-Catholic forces in the mid-19th century, and to assist Irish Catholic immigrants, especially those who faced discrimination or harsh coal mining working conditions.
Triplets:<Ancient Order of Hibernians
4:
--------------------
<Text: Ancient Order of Hibernians:  Many members in the coal mining area of Pennsylvania had a background with the Molly Maguires.>
Triplets:<Ancient Order of Hibernians
5:
--------------------
Text: Ancient Order of Hibernians:  It became an important focus of Irish American political activity.
